subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Peter Sagan won the third stage of the Tour de France, which was marred by crashes. Fabian Cancellara still leads over all by seven seconds.
snippet: Peter Sagan won the third stage of the Tour de France, which was marred by crashes. Fabian Cancellara still leads over all by seven seconds.
